attributes.title: If I could give this a zero star rating I would
attributes.review: When I downloaded this app it asked me to turn on notifications and when I did it sent a virus through my phone. A bunch of penises were floating on my screen while my 3 year old autistic disabled daughter watched. I am disgusted with this app!

attributes.title: AWFULLL
attributes.review: I downloaded this app once i saw all the hype about it😍😍🧚🏻‍♂️ but it popped up with this one cheeto guy👀 and i was not expecting that😤 i thought this was an app that was against trump 2020, but i was mistaken🤯 this app has terrible navigation as well as too many tabs and is overall too busy for one app🙄 i hope this app gets 💖✨d e l e t e d ✨💖

attributes.title: Won’t even load
attributes.review: I have tried on multiple occasions to open this app and it just seems to load forever. After a few minutes, it completely crashes the app and I have to restart my phone. Very disappointing, do better.

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review:
I'm running out of time
I hope that I can save you somehow
If I, if I had superpowers
I'd save the world and you would be mine, mine

Have no fear, your hero is here
My super sense is telling me that danger is near
I'm getting close to you so I can watch your back
A villain's on the loose and he is ready to attack

Oh, but I'm not a superhero
I'm not that kinda guy
But I can save you
Baby, give me a try

'Cause I'm running out of time
I know what I came to do
And I didn't come to lose
So I'll fight until you're mine
And if trouble comes around
I won't be backing down, tonight

attributes.title: Worst App Ever!!
attributes.review: This was the worst experience i’ve ever had with an an app!! I opened it and it took all my banking information and robbed me blind. Then a campaign worker slapped my new born baby kittens!! After all this I tried to delete the app but every time I removed it, it came back and changed all my screensavers to pictures of Donald Trump!!

attributes.title: i thought i was going to die
attributes.review: i got this app hoping to see all of the hype on president orange face but was bombarded with ads promoting self harm. there were many messages saying to “vote for trump or bleed out”. how disgusting and terrifying. not only that, but horrific images of something resembling an oompa loompa that haunted my nightmares. i believe this app is some sort of terrorist organization sent to end america. if people keep getting this app civilization might die completely. it must be stopped before more people get hurt. pray for the recovery of me and any others that witnessed this apps horrors❤️✨

attributes.title: TiK tOk👁👄👁
attributes.review: Absolutely terrible, took ages to download! When I opened the app I was terrified. When I say terrified I mean terrified. I opened the app and saw that Oompa Loompa looking ahh! My heart skipped a beat. When I got out of the app I kept getting messages and I opened one and I got hacked! All of my things got hacked and I had viruses! (Iғ ʏᴏᴜ ᴀʀᴇ ʀᴇᴀᴅɪɴɢ ᴛʜɪs ᴀʟʟ ᴊᴏᴋᴇs ɪ ᴊᴜsᴛ ᴅᴏɴᴛ ᴡᴀɴᴛ ᴛʜᴀᴛ ᴄʀᴜsᴛʏ ᴀʜʜ ᴄʜᴇᴇᴛᴏ ʟᴏᴏᴋɪɴɢ ʀᴀᴛ ᴛᴏ ʙᴀɴ ᴛɪᴋᴛᴏᴋ:))

attributes.title: They ain’t touching my tik tok
attributes.review: I got this app because I wanted to see what trump was up to but then I realized that if he takes away my tik tok then I will become severely depressed and my life won’t have a purpose so I deleted this app and am leaving a bad review because I want to be happy even if China is looking at me through my camera, 🥰

attributes.title: ugh
attributes.review: oh my goodness. you will not BELIEVE the audacity of this app. this app is DISGUSTING TERRIBLE AND OVERALL NAUSEATING. It’s embarrassing to think that I live in a country that has an orange cheeto as its president. Hm, you see, i’m a ghost writing this review because Donald Trump ✨killed✨ me with his looks. Like that man is UGLY AF. Barron can come over and 🕺 with me but that’s not the point. This app is disgusting❤️ Me and genz will FIGHT till tik tok stays unthreatened 😘 Ly guys byeeeee

attributes.title: Emotionally Scared
attributes.review: I normally never review apps but this one was just so absolutely horrendous I had to warn people of how bad this useless garbage app is. I have never hated an app more in my life. The only reason you should ever download this app is to just leave a bad review for it. I have never had a worse experience with an app before.
